special.name: Lobster Ravioli
special.description: Ravioli stuffed with lobster and ricotta, served with butter and lemon sauce.

special.name: Roasted Lamb
special.description: Slow-roasted leg of lamb, served with mashed potatoes and mint sauce.

special.name: Rainbow Sushi Roll
special.description: Sushi roll with a variety of fresh fish, avocado, and cucumber, topped with colorful fish slices.

special.name: Chicken Kebab
special.description: Grilled skewers of marinated chicken, served with pilaf rice and tzatziki sauce.

special.name: Gourmet Hot Dog
special.description: High-quality sausage in an artisan bun, topped with caramelized onions, Dijon mustard, and pickles.
